name: ASS2SRT
short_description:
ASS2SRT
=======

30.09.2014 - New Version 2.20.14.16
22.10.2014 - New WPF Version 2.20.14.20
1) Multiline Subtitels now works correct
2) Fix the removment of comma
3) Fix few virus engines notify
4) Now in Windows Store


Convert ASS-subtitels into SRT-subtitels.
-------------------------------------------------------------

This tool is quick and easy to use.
Simply select the folder who contains the
ASS files and than press start button.
Or you copy the executable into the
folder with ASS files, run the tool and than
press the start button.



New Features:
------------------------------------
- Fixing Drag'n drop bug in wpf version


System Requirements:
------------------------------------
WinXP/Vista/Win7/Win8
32bit / 64bit
.Net

BUGS
------------------------------------
Please, if you find bugs, write an e-mail!
to ass2srt@outlook.de, before you give
bad assessment. Or be so fair and change
your assessment, if the bug has fixed.
